trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Charles Town
There were no other sightings in Charles Town on or around May 30th 2009
Summary: Strange light that changes from a blueish white to red making very fast and sharp movements.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a party and I was sitting on the front porch. I noticed what I thought was a plane coming toward me. I watch it until it went behind a house. A few seconds later it came back out from behind the house but it was glowing red now. Before it was a bright blueish white light. It seemed to be stayig in one general location. I kept losing it in the trees and behind the house. It would make very fast movements and would change direction like fireworks would. This went on for about 20 minutes or so. I just can't think of anything this might be. If you have a idea of what it was please let me know.
